ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), CloseDate > DATE(2021, 01, 01), OR( ISBLANK(Shipping_City__c), ISBLANK(Shipping_Street__c ), ISBLANK(Shipping_City__c), ISBLANK(text(Shipping_State_Province__c)), ISBLANK( Shipping_Zip__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a shipping address. Street, City, State and Zip are required.
